Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.motion

Interface DirectionProvider

All Known Subinterfaces:
BufferedMoveable, Collided, Collider, MotionApplier, MotionModifier, Moveable, SceneBorderCrossingWatcher, SceneBorderTouchingWatcher, SideAwareCollided
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultMotionApplier, DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicCompositeEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity
public interface DirectionProvider
A DirectionProvider exposes a method to acquire the direction.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default double getDirection()
    Get the direction in which the YaegerEntity is moving, in degrees.

  • Method Details

    • getDirection

      default double getDirection()
      Get the direction in which the YaegerEntity is moving, in degrees. If the YaegerEntity is not moving, and therefore has no direction, this method will return NaN.
      Returns:
      The direction in degrees as a double or NaN
